attributes.name: Activewear clothing features
attributes.description: Identifies unique characteristics of activewear, such as four-way stretch or breathable design

attributes.name: Baby/Toddler clothing features
attributes.description: Highlights special features in baby/toddler clothing, like adjustable waistband or UV protection

attributes.name: Baby/Toddler hat style
attributes.description: Describes the style of hats for babies or toddlers, such as bucket hat or sun hat

attributes.name: Baby/Toddler hosiery style
attributes.description: Describes the style of socks or tights for babies or toddlers, like ankle socks or tights

attributes.name: Baby/Toddler sleepwear style
attributes.description: Describes the design of baby or toddler sleepwear, like footed or onesie

attributes.name: Body jewelry type
attributes.description: Identifies the specific type of body jewelry, e.g. belly piercing, ear cuff

attributes.name: Boot style
attributes.description: Specifies the style of boots, e.g. booties

attributes.name: Bra closure type
attributes.description: Identifies how bras are fastened or opened, e.g. front, pull-on (no closure)

attributes.name: Bra coverage
attributes.description: Specifies the level of coverage provided by a bra, such as full or demi

attributes.name: Bra features
attributes.description: Details the unique features of bras, e.g. removable padding, sweat-wicking fabric

attributes.name: Bra strap type
attributes.description: Specifies the style and functionality of bra straps, such as racerback

attributes.name: Bra style
attributes.description: Identifies the design or style of a bra, such as push-up or strapless

attributes.name: Bra support level
attributes.description: Indicates the level of support provided by a bra, e.g. low, medium, high

attributes.name: Bracelet design
attributes.description: Specifies the design of a bracelet, such as charm or cuff

attributes.name: Cup size
attributes.description: Specifies bust size of bras, such as AA or L

attributes.name: Dress occasion
attributes.description: Specifies the intended occasion for a dress, e.g. holiday, everyday

attributes.name: Dress style
attributes.description: Identifies the design of a dress, such as wrap or empire waist

attributes.name: Earring design
attributes.description: Describes the style or structure of earrings, such as hoop or stud

attributes.name: First steps/crawlers style
attributes.description: Specifies the type of footwear for babies learning to walk or crawl, e.g. pre-walkers, soft sole shoes

attributes.name: Fit
attributes.description: Describes the fit of a garment, typically pant shape; e.g. skinny leg, wide

attributes.name: Flat shoe style
attributes.description: Identifies the specific design of flat shoes, such as ballet or espadrilles

attributes.name: Gemstone type
attributes.description: Specifies the primary gemstone used in the item, based on the stone's mineral or material classification.

attributes.name: Handwear features
attributes.description: Describes special features of gloves or mittens, like adjustable closure or enhanced grip

attributes.name: Handwear type
attributes.description: Classifies the type of handwear, e.g. fingerless gloves, snow gloves

attributes.name: Heel shoe type
attributes.description: Identifies the style of heel on a shoe, such as platform heels or wedge heels

attributes.name: Jewelry type
attributes.description: Distinguishes between types of jewelry, such as fine or imitation jewelry

attributes.name: Leather type
attributes.description: Specifies the animal source or type of leather used in the product (e.g., cowhide, calfskin, crocodile, python, synthetic)

attributes.name: Maternity clothing features
attributes.description: Describes unique features of maternity wear, e.g. room for belly growth, supportive cups

attributes.name: Maternity sleepwear style
attributes.description: Specifies the style of maternity sleepwear items, like a onesie or sleep shirt

attributes.name: Necklace design
attributes.description: Describes the style of a necklace, such as pendant or choker

attributes.name: Nightgown style
attributes.description: Specifies nightgown style, e.g babydoll, chemise

attributes.name: Occasion style
attributes.description: Helps categorize products based on occasion, e.g. casual, dress

attributes.name: One-piece style
attributes.description: Identifies the specific style of a one-piece garment, like a jumpsuit or romper

attributes.name: Outerwear clothing features
attributes.description: Identifies special characteristics of outerwear, like insulated or waterproof

attributes.name: Pants length type
attributes.description: Used to defines the length of pants, such as cropped or long

attributes.name: Pantyhose style
attributes.description: Describes the design or functionality of pantyhose, e.g. footless, maternity

attributes.name: Ring design
attributes.description: Describes the style of a ring, such as band or solitaire

attributes.name: Ring size
attributes.description: Specifies the size of a ring, such as L or 6.5

attributes.name: Robe style
attributes.description: Specifies the overall design type or construction style of the robe, such as spa robe or wrap.

attributes.name: Sandal style
attributes.description: Specifies the style of sandals, such as ankle strap or lace-up

attributes.name: Scarf/Shawl style
attributes.description: Identifies the style of scarves and shawls, e.g. blanket, wrap

attributes.name: Shapewear support level
attributes.description: Indicates the compression level of shapewear items, e.g. level 1

attributes.name: Skirt style
attributes.description: Describes the design or cut of a skirt, such as pencil or pleated

attributes.name: Skirt/Dress length type
attributes.description: Defines the length of skirts or dresses, such as mini or maxi

attributes.name: Slipper style
attributes.description: Identifies the style of slippers, such as ballerina or flip-flop

attributes.name: Smart watch features
attributes.description: Describes the capabilities of a smart watch, such as fitness tracker or waterproof

attributes.name: Sneaker style
attributes.description: Identifies the design or type of sneakers, such as athletic or high-top

attributes.name: Suspender style
attributes.description: Defines suspender style, e.g. X-back, Y-back

attributes.name: Swimwear features
attributes.description: Identifies special characteristics of swimwear, like quick drying or UPF sun protection

attributes.name: Undershirt style
attributes.description: Describes the design or cut of an undershirt, such as crew neck or V-neck

attributes.name: Underwear style
attributes.description: Defines the design and cut of underwear, such as bikini or control briefs

attributes.name: Waist rise
attributes.description: Indicates where on the waist a garment sits, like low, medium or high

attributes.name: Watch accessory style
attributes.description: Defines the style of watch accessories, e.g. sporty, modern

attributes.name: Watch display
attributes.description: Distinguishes between watch displays, such as digital or analog

attributes.name: Watch features
attributes.description: Identifies special characteristics of a watch, such as automatic movement or luminous hands

attributes.name: Watch/Band material
attributes.description: Specifies the type of material for watch bands, such as nylon or silicone
